name: Distant 6: Deadly Horizons
description:
You are Marcus, a solution specialist assigned to the Distant 6 mining colony by the Corporation. Usually these jobs are fairly boring, but not this time around. 

Distant 6 is about to become a hotbed of trouble from rat infestations, smugglers, rogue droids and even the dreaded Thraxx! (Lizard like creatures that prey on mankind and can easily overwhelm a colony that does not contain them in time.)

Recruit helpers and purchase better equipment to help you get Distant 6 back in the good books with the Corporation and maybe, just maybe, earn enough credits for a better life somewhere else!

***Current Game Progress - Up to Mission 3 complete!  Some game elements are still in development, but game should allow for stable game playing up to the  completion of Mission 3***

Please let me know your thoughts and comments so I can improve this game!
